name: The Adventures of Nuke Dukem
description:
CONTROLS

WASD - Move
Shoot - Left click
Switch Gun - scroll mouse wheel

Sounds made by Gunnar Clovis, program and art done by me

The rushed adventures of Nuke Dukem, totally unrelated to similarly macho run-and-gun man [redacted by 3D Realms and Gearbox]. 

Made for the Paint Jam 2021 in ~12 hours  (because I thought I had like a month for this jam but misread the dates)

Possible update(s) (if you ~want~ them)

- include new playable character Snolid Sake, cool spy guy extraordinaire 
- include character conversations
- level design of nuke in snolid sake's world and vice versa
